text: you may think of lambchops as a special
occasion dish but if you buy lamb
shoulder chops they're much more

don't cook with shoulder chops is that
they think of them as a braising meat
because there's a lot of sinew in there
but if you cook them really quickly and
you keep them rare to medium-rare
they're very tender they're delicious
you really want to try to season it a
little bit ahead maybe thirty minutes if
you have it just lets the salt penetrate
the meat evenly I'm also gonna use some

sear and then just flip it once now once

get them really brown on the other side
so these lamb chops throw off a lot of
